roleset.name: begin again

example.name: nice simple transitive
example.text: Analysts said Mr. Stronach wants to resume a more influential role in running the company .

propbank.arg: a more influential role in running the company

example.name: ergative
example.text: He said construction would n't resume until market conditions warrant it .

example.name: aspectual
example.text: The news told them it would be a while longer before UAL resumed trading like a regular airline stock after months of gyrations .

propbank.arg: trading like a regular airline stock

example.name: aspectual with agent
example.text: After the restructuring of Waertsilae Marine and bolstered by state loan guarantees , two big bank creditors , Union Bank of Finland and state - controlled Postipankki , resumed lending the shipyard working capital .

propbank.arg: After the restructuring of Waertsilae Marine
two big bank creditors , Union Bank of Finland and state - controlled Postipankki

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: NATIONAL INCOME REALTY TRUST said it will resume dividend payments with a 12 - cent - a - share dividend to be paid Nov. 6 to shares of record Oct. 25 .

propbank.arg: with a 12 - cent - a - share dividend to be paid Nov. 6 to shares of record Oct. 25

example.name: medical example
example.text: pending resumption of normal oral intake

example.name: With arg 0
example.text: Their resumption of peace talks Monday

roleset.note: RESUME-V NOTES: Frames file for 'resume' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class 55.1-1. Comparison with 'start'. (from resume.01-v)
RESUMPTION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in Temprel data. Comparison to resume.01. Resume.01 is a member of VN class begin-55.1-1. Framed by Katie. (from resumption.01-n)
